mapper.select: /*상품 리스트*/ select pd_cost, mg_name, pl_path, pi.mg_num from magazine m join product p on m.mg_num = p.mg_num join product_image pi on p.pd_num = pi.pd_num join (select mg_num, max(substr(pl_path,instr(pl_path,'-')+1,6)) maxdate from product_image group by mg_num) tart on pi.mg_num = tart.mg_num where substr(pi.pl_path,instr(pi.pl_path,'-')+1,6) = tart.maxdate and pl_path like '%thum%'
/*키워드 checkbox*/ select dt_keyword, dt_target from details
/*잡지 코드 가져오기*/ select mg_num from magazine where mg_name=#{mg_name}
/*detail 등록전 사전 등록 여부 확인*/ select mg_num from details where mg_num = #{mg_num}
